author: hboutemy
msg: [MANTTASKS-79] add XML encoding support for pom.xml and settings.xml

author: pmcmahan
msg: GERONIMO-3393 externalize the connector attribute descriptions in TomcatManagerImpl so that they
can be changed outside the java source and translated if desired.  Used the "Externalize Strings"
feature in Eclipse which generates the properties file and a ResourceBundle utility.  It adds a
comment like "//$NON-NLS-1$" to mark lines that contain externalized strings.
For consistency also externalized the strings in JettyManagerImpl using this same utility.

author: hboutemy
msg: [MANTTASKS-79] add XML encoding support for pom.xml and settings.xml

author: kbennett
msg: Added myself (Keith Bennett) as committer, reformated people table row elements
so each person would be on own lines, so diffs would be more helpful in the future.
